Check out Our Store For More Great Items!! ************AUCTION TERMS AND INFORMATION********PLEASE READ BEFORE BIDDING******Terms: We are an honest seller and do our best to provide the most accurate information in all auctions. If you feel there is an error or need clarification please feel free to contact us. E-mails should be sent through eBay only; we can answer any e-mails outside of eBay as this violates eBay policy. In most cases we are a re-seller not the original owner of the item being auction. We do our best to assure all items are in good working condition unless otherwise stated. Before you leave a neutral or negative feedback, please contact us; let us know what we can do to assist you further. We love our customers and we are here to make you happy!Payment information: We accept PayPal and prefer this be our main method of payment. If you cannot pay with PayPal please contact us for further assistance. All payments should be received within 48 hours of the end of the auction. This allows us to ship your item in a timely manner. If you cannot pay within 48 hours you must contact us. We will take action against any payment later than 7 days. Any payment later than 10 days, the auction will be canceled and items will be re-listed.Shipping information: Our goal in most cases is to ship within 1 business day of receipt of payment. We send almost all of our items with FedEx ground, but since they do not have a shipping calculator, we are using the UPS calculator. Differences in shipping will be refunded. We find this is the most economical and cost effective choice for the majority of our customers. With some exceptions like smaller packages or locations where it is price prohibitive we occasionally ship USPS. Shipping Charges can be estimated on either Website respectively.International purchases - we do not ship internationallyLocal pickup:All local pickup items require cash or credit payment at the time of pickup in our store locations All applicable MA state sales taxes apply for local pickup in store purchasesPayPal is NOT accepted for payment of local pickup purchasesReturn Policy:Ultimately, your satisfaction is most important to us. If the item you receive is not as described, I will refund your purchase minus the shipping and handling charges. We CANNOT refund shipping charges. You will also be responsible for the return shipping costs. Items must be returned in their original condition within 7 days of purchase. Please contact me before returning any items.
